name: Sequence Break (Demo)
description:
Break Stuff. Get Stuck. Start Over.

Sequence Break is a retro-3D platformer adventure game.
Break stuff, get stuck, and start over using the items you've collected to take new paths and try new things!

FEATURES:

  • Explore a unique Retro-3D world
  • Solve puzzles using time travel (or something like it)
  • Fight global warming (sometimes literally)
  • I͝n҉̴͝t̴̡e̵͟r̡͟à̕͡ç͡҉t͘ ̸͟͠w͡i̶͞͡t͜h ͘a̸ ́çó͟͡l̵̀҉ór̴҉f̨͢u҉͟l͟͞͡ ̶͜ç̷͡a͟s͞t͟ ̴o͢f̡̀ ҉çh͝a̴̢ra̷͏cte̛̕r҉̛s̡
  • Collect cards & hidden achievements

The Sequence Break Demo is a self-contained microcosm of the full game. The demo offers a complete, albeit very short, adventure that serves to demonstrate the central themes and gameplay elements offered by the full game. Both the full game and the demo version are still under active development, and the demo will receive frequent updates as we continue to expand on the game's mechanics and features.

Gamepad controls are highly recommended.
The game is fully playable with a keyboard, but may not be optimized.

FunctionGamepadKeyboard
MoveLeft Stick[W][A][S][D]JumpA[Spacebar]CrouchB[Shift]TalkX[E]Use ItemY[R]SpinLT[Ctrl]PauseStart[Esc]InventorySelect[Tab]CameraRight StickMouse Middle Button
Fast Item Switch
LB / RBScroll Wheel

You can remap the gamepad by pressing [Start] + [Select] at the title screen, then hitting [ENTER] on your keyboard. Keyboard controls cannot be remapped at this time.

Demo footage may be used freely for Let's Play videos or streams.
